participant_1.background:
I spend time with my family and work on hobbies when I'm not at work.
i am a older gentlemen.
I take long walks in the park to clear my head and relax.
i play for the philadelphia eagles.
I enjoy apples, even the skin, even though it makes my family gag.

participant_2.background:
I'm a thrifty hockey fan who is trying to learn Swedish.
I love my family, but they don't always understand my love for McDonald's or Mortal Kombat.
my favorite store is american eagle.
i enjoy taking late night walks when its completely dark.
I try to take a walk outside to clear my head.

content.text: Hey there, how are you today?
Hey, doing pretty good. What about you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking.
I'm glad to hear it. What do you do for fun?
I like to go for walks in the park, and I also play for the Philadelphia Eagles.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I love going for walks in the park too. Have you been to any good parks lately?
I went to the park the other day, and it was really nice. There were a lot of people out enjoying the day.
That sounds nice. I love the feeling of the sun on my skin and the sound of the birds chirping.
Me too, it's really relaxing. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to play video games, and I'm also trying to learn Swedish.
Oh wow, that's really cool! I've always wanted to learn a new language.
It's definitely a challenge, but it's also really rewarding.
I can imagine. I'm not sure I would have the patience for it.
It's definitely not for everyone, but it's worth a try!
Maybe I'll give it a shot one day.
